title: Airlines Cancel Some Flights Citing Launch of AT&T, Verizon 5G Signals
sub_head: Some international flights suspended even as wireless carriers agree to limit signals within 2 miles of runways to address air-safety concerns
body:
Several international airlines canceled some U.S.-bound flights after American wireless operators and aviation officials were unable to fully resolve a monthslong standoff over the launch of new 5G signals.
AT&T Inc. and Verizon Communications Inc. on Tuesday afternoon agreed to temporarily water down expansion plans for 5G wireless service to address air-safety regulators’ concerns about the network signals’ effect on aircraft instruments.
